features: ✨SELFIE STICK QUADRAPOD WITH FILL LIGHT - Lighted Selfie Stick Quadrapod with remote Combo. 4 Leg Base Makes This Selfie Stick Incredibly More Stable. Plus, Onboard Light On This Selfie Stick. Weighs Only 7 Ounces. Extends From 7.6" to 41”.

💖ONBOARD FILL LIGHT ON SELFIE STICK - The Mobile Phone Holder No Need For An External Selfie Light, Onboard Quadrapod Light Has 12 Bright LED’S, Perfect LED Light For Vloggers, Livestream, Tiktok. Easy Convenient Charging by USB Cable.Selfie Stick For Iphone/Android.

🔋DETACHABLE BLUETOOTH REMOTE - Iphone tripod with The Most Advanced Chips, Fully Compatible With iPhone and Android Devices, Easy To Pair. Remote is Removable From Stick For More Photo Flexibility(Open the mobile phone bluetooth search"VIP" and click the connection.).

⭐MULTI-ANGLE ROTATION & PROTABLE DESIGN - Tripod can Choose Horizontal Or Vertical Camera Modes With 270° Neck And 360° Phone Holder Rotation. Allows For The Best Shooting Angles And Capturing Beautiful Photos.Compact pocket size design, easy to carry.
🎁PACKAGE CONTAINS & CUSTOMER SERVICE - Complete set includes Selfie Stick,Wireless Remote,USB Cable,Instruction Manual. We provide 24-HOUR online technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Selfie Stick Tripod Quadrapod Selfie stick with light/Multicolor Fill Light The upgraded mobile phone tripod has three light modes, each mode has three levels of brightness adjustment, the light can be adjusted from cold light, warm light, and mixed light, the switch has a sponge protection device to avoid accidentally touching the switch, very user-friendly, light The adjustment span is large, and it is very energy-saving. It uses USB charging, and you don’t have to worry about power problems when you travel with a tripod.

Selfie stick for iphone/Selfie stick for android Upgraded Quadrupod Upgraded from a tripod to a quadrupod, stable quadrupod stand and adopts the main pole suspension design, each bracket is equipped with a fixed bracket, and the material is upgraded from aluminum alloy to stainless steel. The upgraded mobile phone holder is more recognized by the majority of customers. Let you enjoy better products.

Tripod with bluetooth remote Compatible with multiple systems Compatible with most mobile phone systems on the market, no need to worry about matching problems, Bluetooth remote control supports 33ft ultra-long distance, no delay in camera sensitivity, and multi-angle photography can be performed at long distances, allowing you to capture every wonderful moment.

Mini size The use of multi-section bracket telescopic structure optimizes the product size, making it less than the size of a palm when shrinking. It is very small and delicate in the hand and in the pocket, does not take up too much space, and uses more space than other styles. , suitable for home, travel, outdoor photography and other occasions, this mobile phone tripod can be dealt with at will. Has excellent performance. Upgraded USB Fill Light The upgraded fill light adopts USB charging, supports 5V 1A and other mobile phone chargers, and also supports mobile power charging. No matter indoors or outdoors, you can use it with confidence, without worrying about no power in the middle, built-in large-capacity battery, Ring light brightness adjustment, saturation adjustment, upgrade three modes and nine gears, which is very powerful for photography of various scenes. Universal angle adjustment The upgraded mobile phone tripod adopts dual-axis universal adjustment, supports 360°*225° angle adjustment, and has a larger photography range, which is conducive to photography from different angles. The newly upgraded material will also make the phone more stable and will not slide. The displacement will not be too tight, the adjustment angle is smooth, and the quality is very reliable.

Detachable bluetooth remote Free Bluetooth photography remote control, built-in new upgrade chip, Bluetooth remote control supports one-key photography, one-key link, one-key release Bluetooth and other operations, ALL IN ONE, very practical, using ELD display light, you can find the keys accurately in dark conditions , Oversized button design, suitable for people with different hand types, more convenient to use.

New optimized size The Selfie Stick is more ergonomic, and the strength of the product is optimized to reduce the weight. It will not feel heavy when placed in a backpack. It is very light. And it can be taken on planes, trains and ships. It is an excellent product that every photography enthusiast cannot refuse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great selfie stick, much better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this selfie stick to take on our anniversary trip. I wanted to get photos of us together and not just right in your face photos, I wanted photos where you could see the background behind us. This stick turned out to be perfect for that. I have a Galaxy S 20 ultra with a case and I was able to use it without removing the case. We used this both as a selfie stick and the tripod (quadpod) and it worked great! The little remote that comes with it, makes it easy to snap a picture. I didn't plan to use the lights that came with it, I mainly purchased this model for the quadpod and how compact it was when folded. However, one night we were sitting in front of a fountain with lights behind us. I took a picture and our faces had shadows on them. Then I put the lights on and took the picture again and the shadows were gone. In my opinion this selfie stick was sturdy, easy to use and not too heavy to carry around every day. I looked at a lot of selfie sticks and read a lot of reviews before deciding on this one. If you're on the fence, for the price, this is a great selfie stick. I plan to purchase a couple more as Christmas gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Selfie stick covers all the squares
reviews.reviewText: 41” Selfie Stick Tripod Quadrapod with 2 Rechargeable Fill Light, Extendable Tripod with Bluetooth Remote, Stainless Steel, 3 Light Modes, 9 Brightness Levels, Compatible for All iPhone & AndroidThis truly provides all the function that I need. It is compact and easy to pack for travel. It appears to be sturdy. Is is easy to attach camera set up and use. It works on my Samsung A50.All functions are intuitive. It is well designed like a swiss army knife. The manual needs to rewritten for english speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing ! I'm disabled, so i struggle to get my phone in clamp. But it HOLDS IT WELL !! It only runs volume in apps ! ON/OFF is only for camera app. So make videos there, then upload to apps. Study enough, great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded My Expectations
reviews.reviewText: So when I saw the size of the tripod and some of the mixed reviews, I was thinking if I didn’t like it, it could be a backup to a better one I get. Since I use it for streaming, it’s perfect to hold my phone and the lights are great!! I love the fact that it’s compact and folds up so I can travel with it! (That’s how I broke my last right light).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better Quality than many more expensive brands!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The quality and functionality of the selfie stick/tripod is top notch. It was easy to set up, paired effortlessly to my iPhone, and delivers as promised. The tiny remote is removable from the handle/base so that it can be used for group photos without need to set a timer and hope everyone is ready! This way you can use the tripod and use either front or rear camera and capture your subject faster easier without frustration. The tripod is great for stabilization of the camera so your images come out sharp and crystal clear. The handy selfie lights have multiple options for warm or cool lights or a mixture of both. I wasn’t expecting so much when I paid under $10 for this item. I recently spent over $40 on a similar product fro a competitor, and I was sadly disappointed. This selfie stick under promises and over delivers! I’m ordering a few more for my family and friends to use as well. Thanks for making a quality product at an amazingly low price!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It Does The Job!
reviews.reviewText: Really nice selfie stick. It is light weight and easy to use. Easy to connect to the Bluetooth clicker. The lights are really nice and it has alot of different options for color and intensity. Even dim they give off a good amount of light. Easy to hold even when fully extended. The only consequence I find is the fact that it is only for a phone and can not be switched with different attachments to hold other somewhat cameras. I'm not feeling the comfort of secure to fit my camera to the selfie stick. The tension on the clips are difficult to open if you have a phone case on your phone. It's not so easily done especially to turn or adjust. The tripod base is not as wide as I had hope for either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tripod for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I was shopping around for a new tripod for my phone and I got this one because it was the cheapest listing. It definitely did not disappoint! The tripod has rechargeable lights, a shutter remote button the is storable in the tripod and it is very sturdy. I've more expensive tripods tip over easily so this is definitely worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this tripod !!
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is just what I been looking for my lash business. It easy to use and the camera for recording video works perfectly. 10/10
